member.name: T:NAnt.Core.Tasks.ScriptTask
member.summary: Executes the code contained within the task.

remarks.para: The script element must contain a single code element, which in turn contains the script code.
A static entry point named ScriptMain is required. It must have a single parameter.
The following namespaces are loaded by default: System, System.Collections, System.Collections.Specialized, System.IO, System.Text, System.Text.RegularExpressions and NAnt.Core.

member.name: M:NAnt.Core.Tasks.ScriptTask.InitializeTask(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes the task using the specified xml node.

member.name: P:NAnt.Core.Tasks.ScriptTask.Language
member.summary: The language of the script block (VB, C# or JS).

member.name: P:NAnt.Core.Tasks.ScriptTask.MainClass
member.summary: The name of the main class containing the static ScriptMain entry point.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.LicenseTask
member.summary: Task to generate a .licence file from a .licx file.
member.remarks: If no output file is specified, the default filename is the name of the target file with the extension ".licenses" appended.

example.para: Generate the file component.exe.licenses file from component.licx.

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.LicenseTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.LicenseTask.Output
member.summary: Name of the resource file to output.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.LicenseTask.Assemblies
member.summary: Names of the references to scan for the licensed component.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.LicenseTask.Target
member.summary: The output executable file for which the license will be generated.
